text: Donatello is one of the four Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He is the brains of the group of brothers and uses a bo staff. He is named after Donatello, one of the Renaissance masters. ==Portrayals== Donnie has been played by Leif Tilden in movies based on TMNT. Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1984 Category:Fictional turtles Category:Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles characters
title: Donatello (Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles)
